column1: This one here?  You want this one??
This one?  this one right here?? Ya waunt this one??
We will not move aside! We will stand our ground!  Like the child on the Charlie Rose show!
What are you doing to my farm?!?

It was about yay big.  I mean the hair on it was out to here , and then it had another trail of hair down from her belly button. I mean, the, the drone. Yeah, that's what I saw. That that's all I saw.
Those boys have shown me the light. I never knew the Mountain Scouts was a hate group.
